H0.text: Cells carry out the basic life functions of an organism.

H1.text: Nutrients carry out the basic life functions of an organism.

H2.text: Atoms carry on the basic life functions of an organism.

H3.text: Hormones carry on the basic life functions of an organism.

A4.text: The cell is the basic structural and functional unit of all forms of life or organisms.

A5.text: Cell metabolism is the process by which individual cells process nutrient molecules.
